name: Make Up & Style
synopsis: Become a make-up artist! In this game, designed by a female game designer, allow your creativity to run wild as a famous make-up artist with realistic make-up tools! You can even create a 3D face, simply by taking a picture of your face, placing it onto a 3D face, and applying make-up. Complete various missions on your way to becoming a professional make-up artist. Features: - Create thousands of different faces - Use the stylus to precisely apply make-up to the 3D face - 16 types of make-up tools: brushes, mascara, lipsticks, eye pencils, and more - 23 missions with a humorous story in Career mode
